targets.rawSql:
SELECT countDistinct(user_agent_string) as unique_user_agents FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) AND user_agent_string != '' AND user_agent_string != '-'

SELECT countDistinct(referer_url) as unique_referers FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) AND referer_url != '' AND referer_url != '-'

SELECT countIf(user_agent_string LIKE '%bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%crawler%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%spider%') * 100.0 / count() as bot_percentage FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)

SELECT countIf(user_agent_string = '' OR user_agent_string = '-') * 100.0 / count() as empty_ua_percentage FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)

SELECT user_agent_string as `User-AgentÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)) as `Âç†ÊØî(%)`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') as `ÈîôËØØËØ∑Ê±Ç`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) AND user_agent_string != '' AND user_agent_string != '-' GROUP BY user_agent_string ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT CASE WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Chrome%' THEN 'Chrome' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Firefox%' THEN 'Firefox' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Safari%' AND user_agent_string NOT LIKE '%Chrome%' THEN 'Safari' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Edge%' THEN 'Edge' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%crawler%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%spider%' THEN 'Bot/Crawler' WHEN user_agent_string = '' OR user_agent_string = '-' THEN 'Empty' ELSE 'Other' END as `ÊµèËßàÂô®Á±ªÂûã`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)) as `Âç†ÊØî(%)`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) GROUP BY `ÊµèËßàÂô®Á±ªÂûã` ORDER BY count() DESC

SELECT referer_url as `Referer`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)) as `Âç†ÊØî(%)`, countDistinct(client_ip) as `Áã¨Á´ãËÆøÂÆ¢`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) AND referer_url != '' AND referer_url != '-' GROUP BY referer_url ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT CASE WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%google.%' THEN 'GoogleÊêúÁ¥¢' WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%baidu.%' THEN 'ÁôæÂ∫¶ÊêúÁ¥¢' WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%bing.%' THEN 'BingÊêúÁ¥¢' WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%weibo.%' THEN 'ÂæÆÂçö' WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%qq.%' THEN 'QQÁõ∏ÂÖ≥' WHEN referer_domain LIKE '%wechat%' OR referer_domain LIKE '%weixin%' THEN 'ÂæÆ‰ø°' WHEN referer_domain = '' OR referer_domain = '-' THEN 'Áõ¥Êé•ËÆøÈóÆ' ELSE 'ÂÖ∂‰ªñÊù•Ê∫ê' END as `Êù•Ê∫êÁ±ªÂûã`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, count() * 100.0 / (SELECT count() FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)) as `Âç†ÊØî(%)`, countDistinct(client_ip) as `Áã¨Á´ãËÆøÂÆ¢` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) GROUP BY `Êù•Ê∫êÁ±ªÂûã` ORDER BY count() DESC

SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, CASE WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Chrome%' THEN 'Chrome' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Firefox%' THEN 'Firefox' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Safari%' AND user_agent_string NOT LIKE '%Chrome%' THEN 'Safari' WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%crawler%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%spider%' THEN 'Bot/Crawler' ELSE 'Other' END as browser_type, count() as requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) GROUP BY time, browser_type ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, countIf(user_agent_string LIKE '%bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%crawler%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%spider%') as bot_requests, countIf(user_agent_string NOT LIKE '%bot%' AND user_agent_string NOT LIKE '%crawler%' AND user_agent_string NOT LIKE '%spider%') as human_requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT business_unit FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_unit IS NOT NULL AND business_unit != ''
